$comment: This is a LEGACY configuration. Each app now has its own vercel.json in apps/{app-name}/vercel.json

notes.multi-app-setup: To deploy individual apps to different domains:
instructions: 2. Each project should point to this same GitHub repo
3. In each project settings, set 'Root Directory' to apps/{app-name}
4. Vercel will auto-detect the vercel.json in each app directory
5. Configure custom domains in Vercel dashboard
